import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import'./ReviewPage.css';// âœ… Import CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReviewPage=()=>{const[flashcards,setFlashcards]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchCards=async()=>{const userId=localStorage.getItem('userId');if(!userId)return;try{const res=await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/flashcards/${userId}`);const data=await res.json();setFlashcards(data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching flashcards:',error);}};fetchCards();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"review-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83D\uDCDA Review Flashcards"}),flashcards.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No flashcards found"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-list",children:flashcards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flashcard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"question",children:["Q: ",card.question]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"answer",children:["A: ",card.answer]})]},index))})]});};export default ReviewPage;
